response.overview: Venture across the threshold of perception--and into a stunning, cyber-generated "museum of unnatural history." From award-winning computer animation visionary Jon McCormack, "Turbulence" plunges your senses into a hallucinatory alternate dimension of luminous spaces, incredible "creatures" and haunting beauty. The resulting cascade of ever-shifting imagery propels you on an exhilarating journey into a realm of pure, audio-visual fantasy, where computer animated silicon "life" evolves right before your eyes! Also includes two animated shorts ENS and TISA.
response.tagline: A Breathtaking Computer Animated Journey Into A "Living" Cyber-Universe
response.title: Turbulence
